title: Mahender Attri
text: In Groww app specifically in commodity market's position bid for target can be set 1 point above or below w.r.t.CMP or you can exit at market price. It is very problematic in case of NG even points in decimal matter so please set this so that we can set bid price even in next decimal point. eg. if NG bought at 385 reaches 386.4 and I set bid at this CMP ,it accepts only at or above 387.4 only and price fall again from 386.6 ,so please fix it so bid can be set at desired next decimal pointsThanks
author: Mahender Attri

title: ITI Jamnagar
text: Dear friends, Because of this app, I have suffered a loss of ‚Çπ25,000. Please do not use it. When there‚Äôs a technical issue in this app and users face losses, the Groww team simply says it‚Äôs the fault of the Aero Exchange and that they can‚Äôt do anything about it. Are we using the exchange‚Äôs app, or are we trading through Groww? Please avoid using this app to prevent similar losses.

title: Dhruv Sinojiya
text: In your application, when we add indicators or drawings to charts, they get saved initially. However, when the app is reinstalled‚Äîeither on the same phone or on a different device‚Äîthe previously saved indicators and drawings disappear. I sincerely request you to introduce an update that ensures all chart indicators and drawings remain saved and synced, even after reinstalling the app or switching devices.
